participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, Mark enjoys spending time in his studio working on music projects.
participant_1.background: i am a recording engineer and own my own studio. i prefer being inside. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. whats up i'm a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Open-minded and serene, Lila is a spiritual seeker who enjoys connecting with nature and practicing mindfulness.
participant_2.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i live in alaska. i like meditation. i am a buddhist.

content.text: I am a little girl who loves to go to the park
